In addition to the numerical sections, a scoreboard may also have smaller sections or panels to display other information, such as team logos, penalty time, timeouts, or even video replays. Some advanced scoreboards may also have built-in sound systems to play crowd noises, music, or announcements.
CRT monitor:
This is a photo of a CRT monitor. A CRT (Cathode Ray Tube) monitor is a type of display device that was commonly used in older computer systems. It has a bulky and boxy appearance, typically with a curved screen. The front of the monitor is covered by a glass screen, which is usually slightly tinted. The screen is divided into a grid of tiny phosphor dots that emit light when struck by an electron beam.

At the back of the monitor, you will find a large, deep casing that houses the electron gun and other components. This casing is usually made of plastic or metal. The back also features various ports for connecting the monitor to the computer, such as VGA or DVI ports.

CRT monitors come in various sizes, ranging from small 14-inch screens to larger 21-inch screens or even bigger. The size of the monitor is measured diagonally across the screen. The resolution of a CRT monitor is typically lower compared to modern LCD or LED monitors.
screw:
This is a photo of a screw. A screw is a type of fastener that typically consists of a cylindrical shaft with a helical thread wrapped around it. The shaft is usually pointed at one end, known as the tip or the point, and has a head at the other end. The head is usually larger in diameter than the shaft and is designed to be turned using a screwdriver or a similar tool.

The helical thread on the shaft is what distinguishes a screw from other types of fasteners. It is a continuous ridge that spirals around the shaft, creating a groove known as the thread. The thread allows the screw to be inserted into a material by rotating it, creating a secure connection.

Screws come in various sizes and shapes, but they generally have a uniform diameter along the shaft, with the thread wrapping around it at a consistent pitch. The head of the screw can have different shapes, such as flat, round, or oval, and may have slots, crosses, or other patterns to accommodate different types of screwdrivers or tools.
screwdriver: This is a photo of a screwdriver. A screwdriver is a handheld tool typically made of metal. It consists of a long, slender shaft with a flat or Phillips head at one end. The shaft is usually cylindrical and has a textured or grooved surface to provide a better grip. The handle of a screwdriver is typically made of plastic, rubber, or wood and is designed to be comfortable to hold. The head of the screwdriver is either flat, with a single slot, or Phillips, with a cross-shaped indentation. The head is used to turn screws by applying torque to either tighten or loosen them.
seat belt:
This is a photo of a seat belt. A seat belt is a safety device designed to secure a person in a vehicle. It typically consists of a long, sturdy strap made of durable material, such as nylon or polyester. The strap is usually adjustable in length to accommodate different body sizes and can be fastened around the waist and shoulder of the occupant. 

At one end of the strap, there is a metal buckle mechanism that allows the seat belt to be securely fastened and easily released when necessary. The buckle typically has a latch that clicks into place when inserted into a corresponding receiver, ensuring a tight and reliable connection. 

In addition to the buckle, seat belts often have a retractor mechanism located near the shoulder area. This mechanism allows the seat belt to automatically retract and tighten in the event of sudden deceleration or impact. It helps to keep the occupant firmly in place and minimize the risk of injury during a collision. 

Seat belts are usually available in different colors, such as black, gray, or beige, and are designed to be comfortable to wear while providing effective protection. They are an essential safety feature in vehicles and play a crucial role in preventing injuries in the event of accidents.
sewing machine:
This is a photo of a sewing machine. A sewing machine typically consists of a sturdy base or table with a flat surface. On top of the base, there is a vertical column that holds the sewing machine's mechanisms. The machine itself is usually rectangular in shape and has a metal or plastic casing.

At the front of the sewing machine, there is a needle that moves up and down to create stitches. Just above the needle, there is a presser foot that holds the fabric in place while sewing. The presser foot can be adjusted to accommodate different fabric thicknesses.

On the side of the machine, there is a handwheel that can be turned manually to move the needle up and down. This is useful for manually positioning the needle or for winding the bobbin.

Above the needle, there is a thread tension dial that controls the tightness of the thread while sewing. This dial can be adjusted to achieve the desired stitch tension.

On the front of the machine, there is a stitch selection dial or buttons that allow you to choose different types of stitches, such as straight stitch, zigzag stitch, or decorative stitches. Some sewing machines also have a digital display for stitch selection.

Near the needle, there is a bobbin case or compartment where the bobbin is placed. The bobbin holds the lower thread that interlocks with the upper thread to create stitches.

At the back of the machine, there is usually a hand or foot-operated lever called the presser foot lifter. This lever raises and lowers the presser foot, allowing you to easily insert or remove fabric.

Lastly, there is a power switch and a foot pedal that controls the speed of the sewing machine. The foot pedal is used to start and stop the machine, and the speed can be adjusted by applying more or less pressure to the pedal.
shield:
This is a photo of a shield. A shield is a piece of defensive equipment typically made of metal or wood. It is usually circular or oval in shape, although there are also rectangular and kite-shaped shields. The outer surface of the shield is often reinforced with a layer of leather or metal, providing additional protection. 

The shield is designed to be held by a handle or straps on the back, allowing the user to hold it in front of their body to block or deflect attacks. It is usually large enough to cover a significant portion of the user's body, providing protection against projectiles, such as arrows or spears, as well as close combat weapons like swords or axes.

Shields can vary in design and decoration depending on the culture and time period they belong to. Some shields may have a central boss, a raised circular or conical shape in the center, which helps to deflect blows and reinforce the shield's structure. Others may have intricate patterns or symbols painted or engraved on the surface, representing the owner's identity or affiliation.
shoe store: This is a photo of a shoe store. A shoe store typically has a spacious and well-lit interior with neatly organized shelves and displays. The store may have a variety of seating areas, such as benches or chairs, for customers to try on shoes comfortably. The walls are often adorned with posters or advertisements showcasing different shoe brands and styles. The store may also have mirrors strategically placed to allow customers to see how the shoes look on them. Additionally, there may be a cashier counter or checkout area where customers can make their purchases.
shoji screen / room divider:
This is a photo of a shoji screen / room divider. A shoji screen, also known as a room divider, is a traditional Japanese partition made of a wooden frame and translucent paper panels. It typically consists of multiple rectangular panels hinged together, allowing it to be folded and adjusted according to the desired configuration.

The wooden frame of a shoji screen is usually made of lightweight and durable materials such as bamboo or cedar. The frame is designed to be sturdy and stable, providing support for the delicate paper panels.

The translucent paper used for the panels is called washi, which is made from natural fibers like mulberry or rice straw. Washi paper allows diffused light to pass through, creating a soft and warm ambiance while maintaining privacy. The paper is often treated with a special coating to enhance its durability and resistance to tearing.

The design of a shoji screen can vary, but it typically features a grid pattern called kumiko. The kumiko pattern consists of thin wooden strips that are carefully arranged to form geometric shapes, such as squares or rectangles. These patterns not only add visual interest but also provide structural support to the screen.
shopping basket: This is a photo of a shopping basket. A shopping basket is typically a handheld container used for carrying items while shopping. It is usually made of lightweight materials such as plastic or metal, and it has an open-top design. The basket is rectangular or oval-shaped, with sturdy handles on each side for easy carrying. The size of the basket can vary, but it is generally small to medium in size, allowing it to be easily maneuvered and carried around while shopping. Some shopping baskets may also have a collapsible design, allowing them to be easily stored when not in use.
shopping cart: This is a photo of a shopping cart. A shopping cart is a wheeled metal or plastic basket used for carrying items while shopping in a store. It typically has a rectangular shape with a handlebar at the top for pushing or pulling. The basket is usually made of wire mesh or plastic and has a deep, open design to accommodate various items. The cart is equipped with four wheels, allowing it to move smoothly and easily throughout the store. Some shopping carts also have additional features such as a child seat, cup holders, or compartments for organizing groceries.
shovel: This is a photo of a shovel. A shovel is a hand tool that consists of a long handle and a flat, usually curved, metal blade at the end. The handle is typically made of wood or metal and is designed to be held and gripped comfortably. The blade of the shovel is usually made of steel and is attached to the handle at a slight angle, allowing for efficient digging and lifting of soil or other materials. The blade is wide and flat, with a sharp edge that helps to cut through the ground. Some shovels may also have a pointed tip, which can be useful for breaking up hard soil or digging in tight spaces.
shower cap: This is a photo of a shower cap. A shower cap is a waterproof head covering typically made of plastic or vinyl material. It is designed to protect the hair from getting wet during a shower or bath. The cap is usually circular in shape and has an elastic band around the edge to ensure a snug fit around the head. The top of the cap is often adorned with various patterns or designs, and it may also have a small loop or hook for hanging purposes. When worn, the shower cap completely covers the hair, keeping it dry and protected from water and humidity.
shower curtain: This is a photo of a shower curtain. A shower curtain is a large rectangular piece of fabric or plastic that is typically hung on a rod or hooks in front of a shower or bathtub. It is designed to prevent water from splashing out and onto the bathroom floor while someone is showering. Shower curtains come in various colors, patterns, and materials to suit different preferences and bathroom decor. They often have reinforced holes or grommets along the top edge, which allow the curtain to be easily hung and moved along the shower rod. Some shower curtains also have a weighted bottom hem to keep them in place and prevent them from billowing out during use.
ski: This is a photo of a ski. A ski is a long, narrow, and flat piece of equipment used for gliding over snow. It is typically made of a lightweight and durable material such as wood, fiberglass, or carbon fiber. The top surface of a ski is usually smooth and may have a decorative design or brand logo. The bottom surface, known as the base, is usually made of a special material that allows for smooth gliding on snow. It may have a pattern of grooves or channels called "ski camber" to enhance stability and control. Skis have curved tips and tails, which help with turning and maneuvering on the slopes. They are often attached to ski boots using bindings, allowing the skier to control the ski's movement. Skis come in various lengths and widths, depending on the skier's skill level, terrain, and skiing style.
balaclava ski mask: This is a photo of a balaclava ski mask. A balaclava ski mask is a type of headgear that covers the entire head, neck, and face, leaving only the eyes and sometimes the mouth exposed. It is typically made of a stretchy and insulating material like fleece or wool to provide warmth and protection in cold weather conditions. The mask is designed to fit snugly over the head, with a long neck portion that can be tucked into a jacket or sweater to prevent cold air from entering. It often has a small opening for the eyes, which can be covered with goggles for additional protection. Some balaclava ski masks also have a separate opening for the mouth, allowing for easy breathing while keeping the face covered.
sleeping bag:
This is a photo of a sleeping bag. A sleeping bag is a type of insulated bedding that is designed to keep a person warm and comfortable while sleeping outdoors or in a tent. It typically consists of a long, rectangular-shaped bag made of durable and lightweight materials such as nylon or polyester. The outer shell of the sleeping bag is usually water-resistant or waterproof to protect against moisture.

The inside of the sleeping bag is lined with soft and cozy materials like fleece or cotton flannel, providing a comfortable sleeping surface. The bag is filled with insulation, which can be made of synthetic fibers or natural materials like down feathers. The insulation helps to trap body heat and keep the sleeper warm.

Sleeping bags often have a zipper running along one or two sides, allowing easy entry and exit. The zipper can be fully or partially opened to regulate temperature and provide ventilation. Some sleeping bags also have a hood or a drawstring closure around the head area to provide extra warmth and insulation.

When not in use, sleeping bags can be rolled or compressed into a compact size for easy storage and transportation. They come in various sizes and temperature ratings to accommodate different climates and personal preferences.
slide rule:
This is a photo of a slide rule. A slide rule is a mechanical calculating device that consists of a ruler-like main body with a sliding central portion. It typically measures around 10 to 12 inches in length and is made of wood, plastic, or metal. The main body of the slide rule is divided into several parallel scales, usually marked with numbers and logarithmic scales.

The sliding portion, also known as the cursor, fits snugly within the main body and can be moved back and forth along the scales. It has a transparent window or indicator that allows the user to align specific numbers or values on the scales for calculations.

The scales on a slide rule are typically logarithmic, allowing for multiplication, division, square roots, and other mathematical operations. The user aligns the numbers on the scales to perform calculations by sliding the cursor.
sliding door: This is a photo of a sliding door. A sliding door is a type of door that is designed to slide horizontally along a track, rather than swinging open and closed like a traditional hinged door. It typically consists of one or more large glass panels that are framed with materials such as wood, aluminum, or vinyl. The glass panels allow for natural light to enter the room and provide a view of the outside. The door is operated by sliding it along the track, which is usually located at the top or bottom of the door frame. Sliding doors are commonly used for access to patios, decks, or outdoor spaces, as well as for interior spaces such as closets or room dividers.
slot machine:
This is a photo of a slot machine. A slot machine is a mechanical or electronic gambling device typically found in casinos or gaming establishments. It consists of a cabinet-like structure with a screen or multiple screens displaying various symbols or images. The machine usually has a lever or a button that players can use to initiate the spinning of the reels.

The main part of the slot machine is the reels, which are vertical columns that contain different symbols or images. These reels are usually three or more in number and spin when the game is activated. Each reel has multiple symbols, such as fruits, numbers, letters, or other themed images.

Above the reels, there is usually a paytable that displays the winning combinations and their corresponding payouts. The paytable helps players understand the rules and potential rewards of the game.

Additionally, slot machines often have various buttons or touch-sensitive areas on the front panel. These buttons allow players to adjust their bet amount, choose the number of paylines to activate, or access additional features like bonus games or free spins.

The exterior design of a slot machine can vary widely, ranging from classic and retro styles to modern and flashy themes. Some machines may have additional features like sound effects, lights, or even video animations to enhance the gaming experience.
snorkel: This is a photo of a snorkel. A snorkel is a long tube-like device used for breathing while swimming or diving underwater. It is typically made of plastic or rubber and consists of a mouthpiece, a flexible tube, and a snorkel mask attachment. The mouthpiece is designed to fit comfortably in the mouth, allowing the user to breathe through it. The tube extends from the mouthpiece and is usually curved to follow the contour of the face. At the top of the tube, there is a snorkel mask attachment that allows the user to secure the snorkel to their face mask, ensuring it stays in place while underwater. The tube is usually transparent or semi-transparent, allowing the user to see the water around them.
snowmobile:
This is a photo of a snowmobile. A snowmobile is a vehicle designed for winter travel over snow and ice. It typically has a long and narrow body with a low center of gravity to provide stability on uneven terrain. The front of the snowmobile features a ski or skis that help steer and navigate through the snow. The rear of the vehicle has a track made of rubber or metal that provides traction and propulsion.

The body of a snowmobile is usually enclosed and aerodynamic, with a windshield to protect the rider from wind and snow. It may also have a seat or seats for the rider and possibly a passenger. The controls, such as the handlebars and throttle, are located in the front of the vehicle for easy access.

Snowmobiles come in various sizes and designs, but they generally have a sporty and rugged appearance. They are often brightly colored, with decals or graphics that add to their visual appeal.
snowplow:
This is a photo of a snowplow. A snowplow is a large vehicle typically used for clearing snow from roads, driveways, and other surfaces. It is characterized by its heavy-duty construction and specialized equipment designed to push or remove snow. 

A typical snowplow consists of a truck or a tractor with a wide, flat blade attached to the front. The blade is usually made of steel and can vary in size, ranging from around 7 to 10 feet wide. It is angled slightly to one side, allowing the snow to be pushed to the side of the road or into a designated area.

The blade of a snowplow can be raised or lowered hydraulically, allowing the operator to adjust its height according to the depth of the snow. Some snowplows also have the ability to tilt or angle the blade, which helps to direct the snow more effectively.

In addition to the blade, a snowplow often has other features to enhance its functionality. These may include a salt or sand spreader, which can be used to apply de-icing materials to the road surface, and a snow deflector, which helps to prevent the snow from blowing back onto the windshield of the vehicle.
soap dispenser: This is a photo of a soap dispenser. A soap dispenser is a container designed to hold liquid soap or hand sanitizer. It typically has a cylindrical or rectangular shape and is made of plastic, glass, or stainless steel. The dispenser has a pump mechanism on top that allows the user to dispense the soap or sanitizer in a controlled manner. The pump usually consists of a nozzle or spout, a push-down lever or button, and a spring mechanism inside. The container is transparent or translucent, allowing the user to see the amount of soap or sanitizer remaining inside. Some soap dispensers also have a small window or indicator to show the level of liquid remaining. The bottom of the dispenser is usually flat or slightly curved to ensure stability when placed on a countertop or sink.
soccer ball: This is a photo of a soccer ball. A soccer ball is typically round in shape and made up of several panels stitched together. It is usually made of synthetic leather or a similar material that is durable and water-resistant. The traditional design consists of black and white pentagonal and hexagonal panels arranged in a pattern resembling a truncated icosahedron. However, there are also variations with different colors and patterns. The ball is inflated with air and has a circumference of about 68-70 centimeters (27-28 inches). It is lightweight and designed to be kicked and maneuvered easily on the soccer field.
sock: This is a photo of a sock. A sock is a type of clothing item that is typically worn on the feet. It is usually made of a stretchy and soft material, such as cotton or wool. A sock is designed to cover the foot and ankle, providing warmth, comfort, and protection. It is typically tube-shaped, with a closed toe and an open end that can be stretched to fit over the foot. Socks come in various lengths, ranging from ankle socks that cover only the foot and ankle, to crew socks that reach mid-calf, and knee-high socks that extend up to the knee. They can also come in a wide range of colors, patterns, and designs, making them a versatile and fashionable accessory.
solar thermal collector:
This is a photo of a solar thermal collector. A solar thermal collector typically consists of a flat or curved panel made of a durable material such as glass or metal. The panel is designed to absorb sunlight and convert it into heat energy. It is usually dark in color to enhance its ability to absorb solar radiation.

The front surface of the collector is covered with a transparent material, such as glass or plastic, which allows sunlight to pass through while minimizing heat loss. Behind this transparent cover, there is an absorber plate or tube that is responsible for absorbing the solar energy and converting it into heat.

The absorber plate or tube is usually made of a material with high thermal conductivity, such as copper or aluminum, to efficiently transfer the heat to a fluid medium flowing through it. This fluid, often a mixture of water and antifreeze, absorbs the heat and carries it to a storage tank or directly to a heating system.

To maximize the absorption of sunlight, the absorber plate or tube is often coated with a selective surface that has a high absorption coefficient for solar radiation and a low emissivity to minimize heat loss. This selective coating helps to increase the efficiency of the solar thermal collector.

The collector is typically mounted on a frame or support structure that allows it to be positioned at an optimal angle to the sun for maximum solar exposure. It may also have insulation on the backside to reduce heat loss.
sombrero: This is a photo of a sombrero. A sombrero is a traditional Mexican hat that is typically made of straw or felt. It has a wide brim that is usually upturned at the edges, creating a distinctive shape. The brim is often decorated with colorful embroidery or patterns. The crown of the sombrero is tall and cylindrical, providing shade and protection from the sun. Some sombreros also have a chin strap to keep the hat secure on the wearer's head.
soup bowl: This is a photo of a soup bowl. A soup bowl is typically a round or oval-shaped dish with a wide and shallow design. It is usually made of ceramic, porcelain, or glass. The bowl has a flat bottom and slightly curved sides that gradually slope upwards. The rim of the bowl is usually wide and slightly raised, making it easier to hold and preventing spills. The size of a soup bowl can vary, but it is typically larger than a regular cereal bowl to accommodate a generous serving of soup. The interior of the bowl is smooth and usually glazed, allowing for easy stirring and serving of soup.
keyboard space bar: This is a photo of a keyboard space bar. A keyboard space bar is a long rectangular key located at the bottom center of a standard computer keyboard. It is typically wider than other keys on the keyboard and is used to insert a space between words or characters when typing. The space bar is usually slightly concave in shape, with a smooth and slightly textured surface for comfortable and accurate pressing. It is often labeled with the word "Space" or a symbol resembling two vertical lines with a gap in between.
space heater: This is a photo of a space heater. A space heater is a small, portable device designed to provide heat in a specific area. It typically consists of a rectangular or cylindrical body made of metal or plastic. The front of the heater usually has a metal grille or mesh covering to allow heat to radiate outwards. On top or at the back of the heater, there is usually a control panel with buttons or knobs to adjust the temperature, fan speed, and other settings. Some space heaters also have a digital display to show the current temperature or timer settings. The bottom of the heater usually has sturdy legs or a flat base to ensure stability when placed on a surface. Additionally, most space heaters have a power cord that can be plugged into an electrical outlet for operation.
space shuttle:
This is a photo of a space shuttle. A space shuttle is a large spacecraft that is designed to transport astronauts and cargo into space. It has a distinctive shape with a long, cylindrical fuselage and two solid rocket boosters attached to the sides. The main body of the shuttle, known as the orbiter, has a delta-wing shape with a flat underside. The orbiter has a heat-resistant thermal protection system made up of tiles and blankets to protect it during re-entry into the Earth's atmosphere.

The front of the shuttle has a large, bulbous nose cone that houses the crew compartment, which can hold up to seven astronauts. The crew compartment has windows for the astronauts to observe and navigate in space. Behind the crew compartment is the payload bay, a large open area where satellites, experiments, and other cargo can be carried.

The shuttle has three main engines located at the back of the orbiter, which are used to propel it into space. These engines are fueled by liquid hydrogen and liquid oxygen. The solid rocket boosters, attached to the sides of the orbiter, provide additional thrust during the initial phase of launch and are jettisoned after they burn out.
spatula: This is a photo of a spatula. A spatula is a kitchen utensil that typically has a long handle and a flat, wide, and thin blade. The handle is usually made of wood, plastic, or metal, and it is designed to provide a comfortable grip for the user. The blade is typically made of heat-resistant material, such as silicone or metal, and it is usually flexible to easily slide under food. The blade can be rectangular or slightly curved, and it is used for flipping, lifting, and turning food items, such as pancakes, eggs, or burgers, while cooking.
motorboat:
This is a photo of a motorboat. A motorboat is a type of watercraft that is designed to be propelled by an engine. It typically has a sleek and streamlined hull, which is the main body of the boat that sits in the water. The hull is usually made of fiberglass or aluminum, although other materials can also be used.

At the front of the motorboat, there is a pointed bow that helps to cut through the water. Towards the back of the boat, there is a flat or slightly raised stern, which provides stability and houses the engine.

Motorboats usually have an open deck layout, allowing passengers to move around freely. They often have seating areas for passengers, as well as storage compartments for equipment and personal belongings. Some motorboats also have a small cabin or enclosed area for shelter or overnight stays.

The engine of a motorboat is typically located at the stern and is covered by a protective housing called an engine compartment. The engine can be an outboard motor, which is mounted on the back of the boat, or an inboard motor, which is located inside the boat's hull. The engine provides the power to propel the boat through the water.

Motorboats also have various other features and accessories, such as steering controls, navigation equipment, safety gear, and sometimes even a small kitchenette or bathroom facilities, depending on the size and purpose of the boat.
spider web: This is a photo of a spider web. A spider web is a delicate and intricate structure created by spiders to catch their prey. It is typically made of silk, which the spider produces from its spinnerets. The web consists of a series of radial threads that extend outward from a central point, forming a spoke-like pattern. These radial threads are connected by spiral threads that spiral inward towards the center of the web. The spiral threads are sticky, designed to trap insects that come into contact with them. The overall shape of a spider web can vary depending on the species of spider, but they are generally circular or orb-shaped. The web is incredibly strong and can withstand the struggles of trapped prey.
spindle: This is a photo of a spindle. A spindle is a cylindrical object typically made of wood, metal, or plastic. It has a long, slender shape with a pointed end and a thicker base. The pointed end is used to hold or support materials, such as thread, yarn, or fabric, while the base provides stability. Spindles can vary in size, but they are generally handheld and easy to grip. They may also have decorative elements or designs carved into the surface.
sports car: This is a photo of a sports car. A sports car typically has a sleek and aerodynamic design. It is characterized by a low profile and a curvaceous body, often featuring a long hood and a short rear end. The front end usually showcases a bold and aggressive grille, along with stylish headlights. Sports cars often have a two-door configuration, emphasizing a sense of speed and performance. They may also have features like air vents, spoilers, and diffusers to enhance aerodynamics. The wheels are usually larger and more stylish, with low-profile tires.
spotlight: This is a photo of a spotlight. A spotlight is a type of lighting fixture that is designed to direct a narrow, intense beam of light onto a specific area or object. It typically consists of a metal housing, a reflector, and a lens. The housing is usually cylindrical in shape and is often made of aluminum or steel. The reflector is located inside the housing and is designed to maximize the amount of light that is emitted from the spotlight. It is usually made of a highly reflective material, such as polished aluminum. The lens is located at the front of the spotlight and helps to focus and shape the beam of light. It is typically made of glass or a durable plastic material. Spotlights can vary in size, with some being small and portable, while others are larger and more powerful. They are often used in theaters, concerts, and other events where a concentrated beam of light is needed to highlight a specific area or performer.
stage:
This is a photo of a stage. A stage is a raised platform typically found in theaters, concert halls, or other performance venues. It is designed to provide a designated area for performers to showcase their talents to an audience. 

The stage is usually rectangular in shape, with a flat surface that is elevated above the ground level. It can vary in size, depending on the venue and the type of performance being held. The stage may be made of sturdy materials such as wood or metal, and it is often covered with a smooth and durable flooring, such as plywood or linoleum.

At the front of the stage, there is often a raised area called the proscenium, which serves as a frame for the performance. This is where the main action takes place, and it is usually marked by a decorative arch or curtain. The proscenium also helps to create a sense of depth and perspective for the audience.

On either side of the stage, there may be wings or side stages, which are hidden from the audience's view. These areas provide space for performers to wait for their cues and make quick entrances and exits during the performance. The wings are typically equipped with curtains or screens that can be opened or closed as needed.

Above the stage, there is usually a grid or rigging system that supports various lighting fixtures, sound equipment, and other technical elements. This allows for the creation of different lighting effects, as well as the hanging of props, scenery, and backdrops.

The stage may also have various features and accessories, such as trapdoors, stairs, ramps, or platforms, depending on the specific needs of the production. These elements help to enhance the performance and provide versatility for the performers.
steam locomotive: This is a photo of a steam locomotive. A steam locomotive is a type of train powered by steam. It typically has a long, cylindrical body with a large smokestack at the front. The body is supported by a set of wheels, usually with a larger set of driving wheels in the middle. The locomotive is equipped with a boiler, which is a large, metal container that holds water and generates steam. The boiler is connected to a firebox, where fuel such as coal or wood is burned to produce heat. The steam generated in the boiler is then directed to cylinders, where it powers pistons that drive the wheels. The locomotive also has a cab, where the engineer and fireman operate the controls and monitor the engine.
through arch bridge: This is a photo of a through arch bridge. A through arch bridge is a type of bridge that features a curved arch that extends above the bridge deck and passes through it. The arch is typically made of steel or concrete and spans from one end of the bridge to the other, creating a continuous curve. The bridge deck, which is the surface that vehicles or pedestrians travel on, is supported by the arch and is usually flat or slightly curved to follow the shape of the arch. The arch itself can be symmetrical, with the highest point in the center, or it can be asymmetrical, with varying heights along its length. Through arch bridges are known for their elegant and graceful appearance, with the arches often serving as a prominent architectural feature.
steel drum:
This is a photo of a steel drum. A steel drum, also known as a steelpan, is a musical instrument that originated in Trinidad and Tobago. It is made from a large metal barrel or drum, typically made of steel. The drum is shaped like a shallow bowl with a flat bottom and a wide, open top. 

The surface of the drum is divided into multiple concave sections, called "pans" or "notes." These pans are created by carefully hammering the metal to create different pitches and tones. Each pan is tuned to a specific note, allowing the player to produce a range of musical sounds.

The steel drum usually has a circular shape, with the diameter varying depending on the size and type of drum. The larger drums, known as bass pans, have a wider diameter and produce lower-pitched notes, while the smaller drums, called lead pans, have a smaller diameter and produce higher-pitched notes.

The drum is often mounted on a stand or placed on a stand-alone frame, allowing the player to comfortably play it while standing or sitting. It is played by striking the pans with rubber-tipped mallets or sticks, producing a resonant and melodic sound.

The steel drum is not only a musical instrument but also a work of art. It is often decorated with vibrant colors and intricate designs, showcasing the creativity and cultural heritage of the people who make and play it.
stethoscope:
This is a photo of a stethoscope. A stethoscope is a medical instrument used by healthcare professionals to listen to sounds within the body, particularly the heart, lungs, and abdomen. It consists of several main parts:

1. Chestpiece: This is the part that is placed on the patient's body to capture the sounds. It typically has a diaphragm and a bell. The diaphragm is a flat, circular disc that is used to detect high-frequency sounds, while the bell is a smaller, cup-shaped attachment used for low-frequency sounds.

2. Tubing: The chestpiece is connected to the earpieces by a long, flexible tube. The tubing is usually made of rubber or plastic and is designed to transmit the sounds from the chestpiece to the listener's ears.

3. Earpieces: The stethoscope has two earpieces, one for each ear. They are usually made of soft rubber or silicone and are designed to fit comfortably in the listener's ears. The earpieces are connected to the tubing and allow the listener to hear the sounds detected by the chestpiece.
scarf: This is a photo of a scarf. A scarf is a long, narrow piece of fabric that is typically worn around the neck or shoulders for warmth or fashion purposes. It can be made from various materials such as wool, cotton, silk, or acrylic. Scarves come in a wide range of colors, patterns, and designs, allowing for personal style and versatility. They can be solid-colored, striped, plaid, or adorned with intricate prints or motifs. The length and width of a scarf can vary, but they are generally long enough to be wrapped around the neck multiple times or draped over the shoulders. Some scarves may have fringed ends, tassels, or decorative embellishments, adding to their aesthetic appeal.
stone wall:
This is a photo of a stone wall. A stone wall is a structure made up of individual stones that are stacked or mortared together to form a solid barrier. The appearance of a stone wall can vary depending on the type of stone used and the construction technique employed. 

Typically, a stone wall has a rugged and natural aesthetic. The stones can be of different shapes, sizes, and colors, giving the wall a unique and organic look. The surface of the stones may be rough or weathered, adding to the wall's character. 

The stones are usually arranged in a pattern, with each stone fitting snugly against the adjacent ones. The joints between the stones can be filled with mortar or left open, depending on the desired style and purpose of the wall. Mortar can be used to create a more uniform and stable structure, while dry-stacked walls without mortar have a more rustic and traditional appearance.

Stone walls can vary in height and thickness, depending on their intended function. They can be used as decorative features, garden borders, or as structural elements to support terraces or buildings.
stopwatch: This is a photo of a stopwatch. A stopwatch is a small handheld device that typically has a rectangular or circular shape. It usually has a digital or analog display screen that shows the elapsed time in hours, minutes, seconds, and sometimes milliseconds. The body of the stopwatch is often made of plastic or metal and may have buttons or knobs for starting, stopping, and resetting the timer. Some stopwatches also have additional features such as lap timers, countdown timers, and split timing capabilities.
stove:
This is a photo of a stove. A stove is a kitchen appliance that typically consists of a flat cooking surface with multiple burners or heating elements. It is usually made of metal, such as stainless steel or cast iron, and is designed to be placed on a countertop or built into a kitchen cabinet. 

The top surface of a stove is usually smooth and level, with raised areas or grates where the burners or heating elements are located. These burners or heating elements are circular or rectangular in shape and are made of metal. They can be controlled individually to adjust the heat intensity for cooking different types of food.

Above the cooking surface, there is usually a control panel or knobs that allow the user to turn the burners or heating elements on or off, as well as adjust the temperature or heat level. Some stoves may also have additional features such as timers, digital displays, or touch controls for more precise cooking settings.

Below the cooking surface, there is usually a storage drawer or cabinet where pots, pans, and other cooking utensils can be stored. Some stoves may also have an oven compartment located underneath the cooking surface, which allows for baking or roasting food.
strainer: This is a photo of a strainer. A strainer is a kitchen tool used for separating solids from liquids or for straining out unwanted particles. It typically consists of a bowl-shaped container with small holes or perforations on the bottom and sides. The size and shape of the strainer can vary, but it is commonly made of metal, such as stainless steel, or plastic. The bowl-shaped container is usually attached to a handle or rim for easy handling and stability. The small holes or perforations allow liquid to pass through while retaining larger solids or particles.
tram:
This is a photo of a tram. A tram is a type of public transportation vehicle that typically runs on tracks or rails. It is similar in appearance to a train but is usually smaller in size. Trams can vary in design depending on the city or country, but they generally have a rectangular or box-like shape with multiple doors for passengers to enter and exit.

The exterior of a tram is often made of metal or fiberglass and is painted in a specific color scheme that represents the city or transit system it belongs to. Trams usually have large windows along the sides to allow passengers to see outside and let in natural light. Some trams may also have advertising panels on the exterior.

Inside a tram, there are rows of seats for passengers to sit or sometimes stand. The seating arrangement can vary, but it is common to see rows of seats facing each other or placed along the sides of the tram. Trams also have handrails or grab handles for passengers to hold onto while standing.

At the front of the tram, there is typically a driver's cabin or control area where the tram operator sits. This area is separated from the passenger area and usually has a large windshield for visibility. Trams may also have electronic display boards inside, indicating the next stop or other important information for passengers.
stretcher: This is a photo of a stretcher. A stretcher is a medical device used to transport injured or immobile individuals. It typically consists of a long, flat surface made of sturdy material such as metal or plastic. The surface is padded to provide comfort and support for the person being transported. Stretcher frames are usually collapsible or foldable for easy storage and transportation. The sides of the stretcher may have handles or grips for medical personnel to hold onto while carrying the patient. Some stretchers also have straps or belts to secure the person in place during transportation.
couch: This is a photo of a couch. A couch is a piece of furniture typically found in living rooms or lounges. It is designed for seating multiple people comfortably. A typical couch consists of a long, padded seat with a backrest and armrests on either side. The seat is usually wide enough to accommodate two or more people sitting side by side. The backrest is positioned at a slight angle to provide support and comfort while sitting. The armrests are located on either end of the couch, providing a place to rest the arms while sitting. The frame of the couch is usually made of wood or metal, and it is covered with various materials such as fabric, leather, or synthetic materials. The upholstery can come in a variety of colors and patterns to match different interior design styles.
stupa:
This is a photo of a stupa. A stupa is a type of Buddhist monument or sacred structure that is commonly found in various parts of Asia. It typically has a distinct architectural design and symbolic significance. Here is a description of what a stupa looks like:

A stupa is usually a solid, dome-shaped structure that is built on a raised platform or base. It is often made of stone, brick, or other durable materials. The dome of the stupa is smooth and rounded, resembling a half-sphere or a bell-shaped structure.

At the top of the dome, there is a pinnacle or spire called the harmika, which is often adorned with decorative elements such as metalwork or jewels. The harmika represents the axis mundi, symbolizing the connection between the earthly and spiritual realms.

Below the harmika, there is a square or circular platform called the anda, which serves as the base for the dome. The anda is sometimes decorated with intricate carvings or reliefs depicting Buddhist teachings or mythological scenes.

Surrounding the dome, there is often a circular path called the pradakshina path, which allows devotees to circumambulate the stupa in a clockwise direction as a form of meditation or worship. Along this path, there may be smaller shrines, statues, or prayer wheels.

Additionally, many stupas have an entrance gate or doorway called the torana, which is often elaborately decorated with carvings or sculptures. The torana serves as a symbolic gateway to the spiritual realm and is considered an important feature of the stupa.
submarine:
This is a photo of a submarine. A submarine is a watercraft that is designed to operate underwater. It typically has a long and cylindrical shape, resembling a large tube. The exterior of a submarine is usually made of a strong and durable metal, such as steel, to withstand the immense pressure of the deep sea.

At the front of the submarine, there is a pointed structure called the bow, which helps the submarine move through the water smoothly. The bow may also have various sensors and equipment for navigation and communication.

On top of the submarine, there are usually periscopes, which are retractable devices used for observing the surface while the submarine remains submerged. These periscopes allow the crew to see what is happening above the water without having to surface.

The main body of the submarine contains various compartments, including living quarters for the crew, control rooms, engine rooms, and storage areas. There are also windows called portholes, which provide natural light and visibility to the outside.

Towards the back of the submarine, there is a large propeller or propellers that provide propulsion, allowing the submarine to move forward or backward. The propellers are usually housed in a structure called the stern.

Submarines also have various hatches and openings for crew members to enter and exit the vessel. These hatches are designed to be watertight, ensuring that water does not enter the submarine when submerged.
suit: This is a photo of a suit. A suit typically consists of a jacket and trousers made from matching or coordinating fabric. The jacket is usually tailored with a structured silhouette, featuring a collar, lapels, and buttons down the front. It may have pockets on the chest and sides. The trousers are designed to be worn at the waist and are usually straight-legged or slightly tapered. They often have pockets at the front and back. Suits are commonly made from materials such as wool, cotton, or linen, and they come in various colors and patterns, including solid colors, pinstripes, or checks. Suits are often worn with a dress shirt, a tie, and dress shoes to complete a formal or professional look.
sundial: This is a photo of a sundial. A sundial is a device used to measure time by the position of the sun. It typically consists of a flat plate or disk with markings or numbers representing the hours of the day. The plate is usually made of metal or stone and is placed in a horizontal position. A gnomon, which is a thin rod or triangular shape, is positioned upright in the center of the plate. The gnomon casts a shadow on the plate, and as the sun moves across the sky, the shadow moves along the markings, indicating the time of day. Sundials can come in various shapes and sizes, but they generally have a circular or semi-circular design. Some sundials may also have additional features such as decorative engravings or a compass rose to indicate the cardinal directions.
sunglasses:
This is a photo of a sunglasses. Sunglasses are a type of eyewear designed to protect the eyes from harmful ultraviolet (UV) rays and bright sunlight. They typically consist of two lenses, one for each eye, which are usually made of tinted or polarized glass or plastic. The lenses are enclosed within a frame, which can be made of various materials such as metal, plastic, or acetate.

The shape and style of sunglasses can vary greatly. Some common shapes include aviator, wayfarer, cat-eye, round, rectangular, and square. The frames can be thin or thick, and they may have different colors or patterns. The lenses can also come in various shades, ranging from dark to light, depending on the level of sun protection needed.

Sunglasses often have arms or temples that extend from the sides of the frame to hold the glasses in place on the wearer's face. These arms can be straight or curved, and they may have hinges to allow for folding and easy storage. Additionally, sunglasses may have a nose bridge, which is a small piece that rests on the wearer's nose to provide stability and comfort.
sunscreen: This is a photo of a sunscreen. Sunscreen typically comes in the form of a lotion, cream, gel, or spray. It is usually packaged in a bottle, tube, or aerosol can. The product itself is usually white or cream-colored, but can also be tinted or transparent. Sunscreen has a smooth and creamy texture, making it easy to apply on the skin. It may have a slight fragrance or be fragrance-free depending on the brand. Some sunscreens also contain additional ingredients such as moisturizers or antioxidants to provide extra benefits for the skin.
suspension bridge:
This is a photo of a suspension bridge. A suspension bridge is a type of bridge that is supported by cables suspended from towers or piers. It typically consists of a deck or roadway that hangs from these cables, creating a visually striking and elegant structure.

The main feature of a suspension bridge is its long span, allowing it to cross large bodies of water or deep valleys. The deck is usually made of steel or concrete and is supported by vertical suspender cables that connect to the main cables. These main cables are anchored to the towers or piers at each end of the bridge and are under tension, providing the primary support for the bridge.

The towers or piers of a suspension bridge are tall and sturdy structures that are designed to withstand the forces exerted by the cables and the weight of the deck. They often have a distinctive shape, with a tapered or triangular profile, and may be made of steel, concrete, or a combination of both.

The cables of a suspension bridge are the most prominent feature, giving it a unique and recognizable appearance. These cables are typically made of high-strength steel wires bundled together to form large strands. The strands are then wrapped around each other to create the main cables, which are anchored to the towers or piers and provide the primary support for the bridge.

Suspension bridges often have additional features, such as walkways or bike lanes, that are attached to the sides of the main deck. These provide space for pedestrians and cyclists to cross the bridge safely.
mop:
This is a photo of a mop. A mop is a cleaning tool typically made of a long handle and a head. The handle is usually made of a sturdy material such as metal or plastic, and it is designed to be held and maneuvered easily. The head of the mop is usually made of absorbent materials such as cotton or microfiber, which are attached to the handle.

The head of the mop is typically shaped like a rectangle or a circle, and it is attached to the handle at one end. The size of the mop head can vary, but it is usually large enough to cover a significant area when cleaning. The absorbent material on the head is designed to soak up liquids and dirt from the floor.

Some mops also have additional features, such as a wringer mechanism that allows you to squeeze out excess water from the mop head. This can be useful for controlling the amount of moisture on the floor while cleaning.
sweatshirt:
This is a photo of a sweatshirt. A sweatshirt is a type of long-sleeved garment typically made of a soft and comfortable fabric, such as cotton or fleece. It is designed to be worn over the upper body and is often loose-fitting. 

A sweatshirt usually has a round or V-shaped neckline, although there are variations with hoods as well. The sleeves are long and extend to the wrists, providing warmth and coverage. The bottom hem of a sweatshirt is typically elasticized or ribbed, allowing it to fit snugly around the waist.

Sweatshirts often feature a front pocket, located towards the lower abdomen area, which can be used to keep hands warm or store small items. They may also have ribbed cuffs on the sleeves to provide a comfortable fit and prevent cold air from entering.

Sweatshirts come in a variety of colors and designs, ranging from solid colors to patterns, logos, or graphic prints. They are popular casual wear and are commonly worn during colder seasons or for athletic activities.
swim trunks / shorts:
This is a photo of a swim trunks / shorts. Swim trunks, also known as swim shorts, are a type of clothing worn by individuals while swimming or engaging in water-related activities. They are typically made from lightweight and quick-drying materials such as nylon or polyester.

Swim trunks are designed to be comfortable and provide freedom of movement in the water. They usually have an elastic waistband with a drawstring, allowing for easy adjustment and a secure fit. Some swim trunks may also have a Velcro or snap closure in addition to the drawstring.

The length of swim trunks can vary, ranging from above the knee to mid-thigh. They are often loose-fitting to ensure comfort and ease of movement. Some swim trunks may have a mesh lining on the inside to provide additional support and prevent transparency when wet.

Swim trunks come in a wide variety of colors, patterns, and designs. They can feature solid colors, stripes, floral prints, or even novelty designs. Additionally, some swim trunks may have pockets, either on the sides or back, for storing small items like keys or a wallet.
swing:
This is a photo of a swing. A swing is a suspended seat that is typically made of a sturdy material such as wood or metal. It consists of a horizontal seat that is attached to two vertical chains or ropes, which are in turn connected to a horizontal beam or frame. The seat is usually designed to accommodate one person, but there are also larger swings that can accommodate multiple people.

The seat of a swing is often flat or slightly curved, providing a comfortable sitting surface. It may have a backrest or armrests for added support and comfort. The chains or ropes that hold the seat are securely attached to the frame or beam, allowing the swing to move back and forth freely.

Swings can come in various sizes and designs, ranging from simple and traditional to more elaborate and decorative. Some swings have additional features such as cushions or padding for extra comfort. They can be found in different colors and styles to suit personal preferences and the surrounding environment.

When in use, a swing moves in a pendulum-like motion, with the seat swinging back and forth. The swinging motion can be gentle and relaxing or more energetic, depending on the force applied by the person using the swing. Swings are commonly found in playgrounds, parks, and backyard settings, providing a fun and enjoyable experience for people of all ages.
electrical switch: This is a photo of a electrical switch. An electrical switch typically consists of a small rectangular or square-shaped device with a lever or button that can be toggled or pressed. It is usually made of plastic or metal and has a smooth surface. The lever or button is often colored differently from the rest of the switch to make it easily visible and distinguishable. The switch may also have markings or labels indicating its function or position. On the backside, there are usually metal terminals or screws for connecting electrical wires.
syringe: This is a photo of a syringe. A syringe is a small, cylindrical medical instrument typically made of plastic or glass. It consists of a barrel, a plunger, and a needle. The barrel is the main body of the syringe, usually transparent or translucent, allowing the user to see the contents and measure the volume accurately. The plunger is a movable component that fits snugly inside the barrel and is used to draw in or push out fluids. It has a handle or a thumb pad for easy manipulation. The needle is attached to the end of the barrel and is used for injecting or withdrawing fluids. It is usually sharp and has a protective cap when not in use. The size and shape of the syringe may vary depending on its intended use, but the basic design remains the same.
table lamp:
This is a photo of a table lamp. A table lamp typically consists of a base, a stem, and a lampshade. The base is usually made of materials like metal, wood, or ceramic and provides stability for the lamp. The stem is a vertical structure that connects the base to the lampshade. It can be straight or curved, depending on the design.

The lampshade is the top part of the lamp and is usually made of fabric, glass, or plastic. It is designed to diffuse and direct the light emitted by the lamp. Lampshades come in various shapes and sizes, such as cylindrical, conical, or drum-shaped. They can be plain or decorated with patterns, textures, or colors.

Table lamps often have a switch or a knob located on the base or stem, allowing you to turn the lamp on or off easily. Some lamps may also have adjustable features, such as a flexible neck or a swivel mechanism, allowing you to direct the light in different directions.
tank:
This is a photo of a tank. A tank is a large military vehicle designed for combat operations. It typically has a heavy armored body that provides protection to the crew inside. The exterior of a tank is usually covered in thick metal plates, which are often sloped to deflect incoming projectiles. Tanks have caterpillar tracks on either side, allowing them to traverse various terrains, including rough or uneven surfaces.

At the front of the tank, there is a turret that houses the main armament, which can be a large-caliber cannon or a missile launcher. The turret is capable of rotating 360 degrees, enabling the tank to engage targets in any direction without having to turn the entire vehicle. Additionally, the turret often has secondary weapons such as machine guns or anti-aircraft guns.

The crew compartment is located in the center of the tank and is accessed through hatches on the top or sides. Inside, there are usually positions for a driver, a gunner, and a commander. The driver sits at the front of the tank, while the gunner and commander are positioned in the turret.
tape player: This is a photo of a tape player. A tape player is a device that is typically rectangular in shape. It usually has a front panel with various buttons and controls for operating the player. The front panel may include buttons for play, stop, rewind, fast forward, and eject. There is also a slot or compartment where the cassette tape is inserted. On the front panel, there is often a display screen that shows information such as the track number or the elapsed time. Some tape players may also have additional features like a built-in radio tuner or a headphone jack. On the back or side of the player, there are usually ports for connecting external speakers or other audio devices. The overall design and appearance of a tape player can vary depending on the brand and model, but these are the common features you would typically find on one.
teapot: This is a photo of a teapot. A teapot is a small, usually ceramic or metal vessel used for brewing and serving tea. It typically has a round or oval shape with a handle on one side and a spout on the opposite side. The lid of the teapot is usually removable and fits snugly to keep the tea hot. The body of the teapot can vary in design, ranging from simple and functional to ornate and decorative. Some teapots have a built-in strainer or infuser to hold loose tea leaves, while others require the use of a separate tea strainer.
teddy bear: This is a photo of a teddy bear. A teddy bear is a soft and cuddly stuffed toy that is typically made of plush fabric. It is usually shaped like a bear, with a round head, a snout, and two small ears on top. The bear has a friendly and adorable face, with two button-like eyes, a small nose, and a stitched mouth. Its body is plump and huggable, with short arms and legs. The bear is usually dressed in a cute outfit, such as a bowtie or a little sweater. It comes in various sizes, from small handheld ones to large ones that can be as tall as a child.
television:
This is a photo of a television. A television is a rectangular electronic device that typically has a flat screen. It is usually made of plastic or metal and is designed to be placed on a stand or mounted on a wall. The screen is the main component of a television and is where the images and videos are displayed. It can vary in size, ranging from small screens around 20 inches to larger screens that can be over 70 inches diagonally. The screen is surrounded by a bezel, which is a frame that holds the screen in place. 

On the front of the television, there are various buttons or touch-sensitive controls that allow you to adjust the volume, change channels, and navigate through the menu options. Some televisions also have a remote control that allows you to control the device from a distance. 

At the back of the television, you will find input and output ports, such as HDMI, USB, and audio ports. These ports allow you to connect external devices like gaming consoles, DVD players, or sound systems to enhance your viewing experience. 

Most modern televisions are equipped with built-in speakers, but some may also have additional audio output options for connecting external speakers or soundbars. Additionally, many televisions now come with smart features, allowing you to access streaming services, browse the internet, and download apps directly on the TV.
tennis ball: This is a photo of a tennis ball. A tennis ball is a small, spherical object typically measuring about 2.7 inches (6.86 centimeters) in diameter. It is made of a rubber core covered with a fuzzy felt material. The outer felt layer is usually bright yellow or green, although other colors may also be used. The felt has a slightly rough texture, providing grip and control when playing tennis. The ball is lightweight and bouncy, designed to be easily hit and maneuvered during a game.
thatched roof: This is a photo of a thatched roof. A thatched roof is a traditional roofing style that is made from dried vegetation such as straw, reeds, or grasses. It has a distinct appearance characterized by a layered, textured, and slightly uneven surface. The thatch is typically arranged in bundles or "thatches" and laid in overlapping rows from the bottom to the top of the roof. The thickness and density of the thatch can vary depending on the region and style of construction. Thatched roofs often have a gentle slope to allow rainwater to run off easily. The natural materials used in thatching give the roof a rustic and organic look, blending harmoniously with the surrounding environment.
front curtain:
This is a photo of a front curtain. A front curtain is a large piece of fabric or material that is typically hung at the front of a stage or performance area. It is used to conceal the stage from the audience's view before a performance begins and is often the first thing that the audience sees when they enter the venue.

Front curtains can vary in size, color, and design depending on the production or event. They are usually made from heavy, durable materials such as velvet or velour to provide a rich and elegant appearance. The most common color for front curtains is black, as it helps to create a sense of anticipation and focus the audience's attention on the stage.

Front curtains are often equipped with various mechanisms to allow for easy opening and closing. These mechanisms can include manual operation by stagehands or automated systems that can be controlled remotely. Some front curtains may also have decorative elements such as fringes, tassels, or intricate patterns to enhance their visual appeal.
thimble: This is a photo of a thimble. A thimble is a small, cylindrical object typically made of metal or plastic. It is designed to protect the finger while sewing or stitching. Thimbles usually have a closed top and an open bottom, allowing the finger to be inserted comfortably. They often have ridges or indentations on the surface to provide a better grip on the needle. Thimbles can come in various sizes and designs, but they are generally small enough to fit snugly on the fingertip.
threshing machine:
This is a photo of a threshing machine. A threshing machine is a large agricultural machine used to separate grain from the stalks and husks. It typically consists of a sturdy frame with wheels for mobility. At the front of the machine, there is a feeding mechanism that allows the stalks of grain to be fed into the machine. Inside the machine, there are various components that work together to separate the grain from the rest of the plant material.

One of the key components is a rotating drum or cylinder with spikes or teeth. This drum is responsible for threshing, which is the process of separating the grain from the stalks. As the stalks are fed into the machine, they come into contact with the rotating drum, which agitates and beats them, causing the grain to separate.

Behind the threshing drum, there is usually a shaking or vibrating mechanism that helps to further separate the grain from the remaining plant material. This mechanism can be adjusted to control the intensity of the shaking or vibrating action.

Once the grain is separated, it falls through a series of screens or sieves that allow the grain to pass through while retaining larger pieces of plant material. The separated grain is collected in a container or chute for further processing or storage.

Threshing machines can vary in size and design depending on the specific model and era. Some older models may have additional features like a straw chopper or a bagging attachment.
throne:
This is a photo of a throne. A throne is a grand and majestic seat typically reserved for a monarch or a person of high authority. It is often elevated on a platform or dais to symbolize power and importance. Thrones can vary in design and style depending on the culture and time period, but they generally share some common characteristics.

A throne is usually larger and more ornate than regular chairs, featuring intricate carvings, gilded details, and luxurious materials. It may be adorned with precious gemstones, gold leaf, or other decorative elements. The backrest of a throne is often tall and imposing, sometimes featuring a high arch or a canopy-like structure.

Thrones are designed for comfort and regal presence. They typically have a wide and cushioned seat, providing ample space for the person sitting on it. The armrests are often elaborately decorated and may be adorned with symbols of power or authority, such as a crown or a coat of arms.

The base of a throne is usually sturdy and stable, often supported by legs or a pedestal. Some thrones may have steps leading up to them, emphasizing the elevated status of the person sitting on the throne.
tile roof: This is a photo of a tile roof. A tile roof is made up of individual clay or concrete tiles that are laid in overlapping rows to create a protective covering for a building. The tiles are typically rectangular or semi-cylindrical in shape and have a slightly curved or flat profile. They can come in various colors, including earth tones like red, brown, or terracotta, as well as shades of gray or black. The surface of the tiles may be smooth or textured, depending on the style and manufacturer. When installed, the tiles are arranged in a pattern, with each row overlapping the one below it, creating a visually appealing and durable roof. The overall appearance of a tile roof can vary depending on the specific design and region, but it often gives a classic and elegant look to a building.
toaster: This is a photo of a toaster. A toaster is a small kitchen appliance that is typically rectangular in shape. It is made of metal, usually stainless steel or plastic, and has a hinged lid on top. The top lid is designed to hold and secure slices of bread or other food items to be toasted. Inside the toaster, there are heating elements that generate heat to toast the bread. On the front of the toaster, there is a control panel with various settings to adjust the toasting time and temperature. This panel may also include buttons or knobs to select the desired level of toasting, such as light, medium, or dark. Some toasters also have additional features like defrost or bagel settings. At the bottom of the toaster, there is a removable crumb tray to collect any crumbs or debris that may fall during the toasting process.
tobacco shop:
This is a photo of a tobacco shop. A tobacco shop is typically a small, specialized retail store that caters to customers interested in tobacco products. The shop may have a traditional or modern design, depending on its location and target audience. 

Upon entering a tobacco shop, you may notice a distinct aroma of tobacco lingering in the air. The shop is usually well-lit, with shelves and display cases showcasing a wide variety of tobacco-related items. These may include different types of cigarettes, cigars, pipe tobacco, rolling papers, and smoking accessories such as lighters, pipes, and ashtrays.

The walls of the shop may be adorned with posters or artwork related to tobacco culture or famous tobacco brands. Some tobacco shops also have seating areas where customers can relax and enjoy their purchases. In addition to tobacco products, some shops may also offer a selection of beverages, snacks, or magazines for customers to enjoy while they browse.

The staff at a tobacco shop are knowledgeable about the different products and can provide guidance and recommendations based on customers' preferences. They may also be able to assist with any questions regarding the proper use and maintenance of smoking accessories.
toilet seat: This is a photo of a toilet seat. A toilet seat is typically a flat, oval-shaped object that is designed to fit on top of a toilet bowl. It is made of a durable material, such as plastic or wood, and is usually attached to the toilet bowl with hinges. The seat is divided into two parts: the main seat and the lid. The main seat is the part that you sit on, and it is contoured to provide comfort. The lid is located at the back of the seat and can be lifted or closed to cover the bowl when not in use. Some toilet seats also have additional features, such as a soft-close mechanism that prevents slamming, or a built-in bidet function for personal hygiene.
torch: This is a photo of a torch. A torch is a handheld device that typically consists of a cylindrical body with a handle at one end. The body of the torch is usually made of metal or plastic and is designed to be durable and lightweight. At the opposite end of the handle, there is a bulb or LED light source that emits a bright beam of light. This light source is protected by a transparent cover, often made of glass or plastic, which allows the light to shine through while keeping it safe from external elements. The torch may also have a switch or button on the handle to turn the light on and off. Some torches may have additional features such as adjustable brightness levels, a focus or zoom function to adjust the beam width, or a strobe mode for emergency signaling.
totem pole:
This is a photo of a totem pole. A totem pole is a tall, vertical sculpture traditionally carved by Indigenous peoples of the Pacific Northwest Coast of North America. It is typically made from a single tree trunk and can reach heights of up to 40 feet or more. Totem poles are characterized by their intricate and detailed carvings, which depict various figures and symbols that hold cultural and spiritual significance.

The carvings on a totem pole often represent ancestral beings, animals, mythical creatures, or important events in the community's history. Each figure is stacked on top of one another, forming a vertical narrative. The carvings are usually painted in vibrant colors, with red, black, blue, and green being commonly used.

The overall shape of a totem pole can vary, but it typically has a wide base that narrows towards the top. Some totem poles may have multiple sections or tiers, with each section representing a different story or theme. The carvings are often deeply carved, with intricate details such as feathers, scales, or facial expressions.

Totem poles are not only artistic creations but also serve as important cultural symbols, representing the identity, history, and beliefs of the Indigenous communities that create them. They are often found in public spaces, cultural centers, or displayed within Indigenous communities as a way to honor and preserve their heritage.
tow truck:
This is a photo of a tow truck. A tow truck is a large vehicle specifically designed for towing other vehicles. It typically has a sturdy and powerful engine to handle the weight of the towed vehicles. The most distinctive feature of a tow truck is the flatbed or the towing arm attached to the rear of the truck.

In the case of a flatbed tow truck, it has a long, flat platform at the back that can be hydraulically raised or lowered. This platform is used to transport vehicles by allowing them to be driven or pulled onto it. Once the vehicle is secured, the platform is raised and locked into place, ensuring safe transportation.

Alternatively, some tow trucks have a towing arm or boom attached to the rear. This arm can be extended and retracted, allowing the tow truck to hook onto the disabled vehicle and lift it off the ground. The arm is usually equipped with a winch or a cable system to assist in the towing process.

Tow trucks often have additional equipment such as safety lights, reflectors, and signage to alert other drivers on the road. They may also have storage compartments for tools and equipment needed for towing and roadside assistance.
toy store:
This is a photo of a toy store. A toy store is a vibrant and colorful place, filled with a wide variety of toys and games. As you enter, you are greeted by shelves and displays that are neatly organized and stocked with toys of all shapes and sizes. The store is usually well-lit, allowing the toys to catch your attention and spark your imagination.

The walls are often adorned with colorful posters and decorations, featuring popular characters from movies, cartoons, and books. The aisles are wide and spacious, allowing customers to browse and explore the different sections of the store easily.

The shelves are lined with toys of different categories, such as action figures, dolls, board games, puzzles, stuffed animals, building blocks, and more. Each section is carefully arranged, making it easy for customers to find what they are looking for.

There are usually interactive displays and play areas where children can try out certain toys before purchasing them. These areas are designed to engage and entertain, allowing kids to have a hands-on experience with the toys.

The checkout area is typically located near the entrance or at a central point in the store. It is equipped with cash registers and friendly staff members who are ready to assist customers with their purchases and answer any questions they may have.
tractor:
This is a photo of a tractor. A tractor is a large, heavy-duty vehicle primarily used in agriculture and construction. It typically has a sturdy and robust design to handle tough terrains and heavy loads. 

A tractor usually consists of a long, rectangular chassis or frame that sits on four large wheels. The wheels are often equipped with deep treads or specialized tires for better traction on various surfaces. 

At the front of the tractor, there is usually a powerful engine enclosed within a hood or bonnet. The engine provides the necessary power to operate the tractor and drive its various functions. 

Behind the engine, there is a driver's seat or cab where the operator sits. The cab is often enclosed and equipped with windows for visibility and protection. Inside the cab, there are controls and instruments for operating the tractor, such as a steering wheel, pedals, levers, and gauges. 

Towards the rear of the tractor, there may be additional attachments or implements, depending on the specific purpose of the tractor. These can include a three-point hitch, power take-off (PTO), hydraulic systems, and other mechanisms for connecting and operating various agricultural or construction equipment.
semi-trailer truck:
This is a photo of a semi-trailer truck. A semi-trailer truck, also known as a tractor-trailer or an 18-wheeler, is a large commercial vehicle used for transporting goods over long distances. It consists of two main components: a tractor unit and a trailer.

The tractor unit, also called the cab or the "truck," is the front part of the vehicle. It is equipped with a powerful engine, a driver's cabin, and various controls and instruments. The cab usually has a large windshield for good visibility and may have sleeping quarters for long-haul drivers.

The trailer is the rear part of the truck and is connected to the tractor unit through a hitching mechanism. It is a long rectangular structure with no front wheels, relying on the tractor unit for support and propulsion. The trailer is usually made of steel or aluminum and has a solid floor and sidewalls.

The size of a semi-trailer truck can vary, but it is typically around 70 to 80 feet long and up to 13.5 feet tall. The trailer may have multiple axles to distribute the weight of the cargo and ensure stability. The rear of the trailer often has doors or a roll-up door for loading and unloading goods.
